attributes.action: stop council cuts affecting domestic abuse and malvern womans refuge
attributes.additional_details: Stop cut backs in malvern which are affecting all aspects of support from Stonham group. Domestic abuse - womens refuge, freedom programme and outreach support. Homelessness, Mental health, Housing, Disability etc. Our womans refuge may face closure which will affect woman out there that need this service, freedom programme will no longer take place, this teaches woman about domestic abuse and gives them knowledge of what is happening to them, a very important thing for woman.
